content.prompt: Which of the following is an implicit claim that the author makes in the second paragraph?

choices.label: In some cases, governments need to stifle freedom of speech.
Religion has been a force holding back the progress of humanity.
Man’s natural condition is one of suffering and a struggle for survival.
Loyalty to one’s nation is the greatest virtue a person can aspire to have.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
